abstract: John Drew Theater Lab in East Hampton offers free staged readings of new works by established and up-and-coming playwrights (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: The John Drew Theater Lab in East Hampton is a place for established and fledgling playwrights to present staged readings of their new works.
snippet: The John Drew Theater Lab in East Hampton is a place for established and fledgling playwrights to present staged readings of their new works.

headline.main: Where New Works Go to Be Nurtured: John Drew Theater Lab in East Hampton
headline.print_headline: Where New Works Go to Be Nurtured
